overview: Scarlett Pain & Sonya Sage:  Scarlett's gonna get back at her stepsister for stealing her mp3 player. Missy Martinez & Aubrey Addams:  While her stepsister is out of town, Aubrey is going to get to know her girlfriend.  Alia Janine & Mellanie Monroe:  Alia just wants to take some artsy photos of her girlfriend's stepsister, Mellanie. They'll be tasteful. Seriously.  Danalea & Crissy Moon:  Danalea checks in with her girlfriend's stepsister, Crissy, before bed.
tagline: It all started with a friendly kiss, but it felt so good we didn't want to stop!
title: I Screwed My Stepsister's Girlfriend 2
